title: communicationSetup
description: This schema is used to set up the email addresses and phone numbers for texts for jet to use for communicating with you for various reasons

general_communication_info.description: Contact information for various types of commnications you may want for your organization

information_type.description:
the type of contact that the phone number and email address is for

                    #Valid Values

                    *'listing status' - listing status updates 

                    *'product questions' - questions about your products 

                    *'business update' - where you want business updates 

                    *'technical notifications' - technical notifications and updates

contact_name.description: name of the person who will be contacted for imformation regarding the information type

contact_text_number.description: phone number that should be texted with the information regarding the information type

contact_email.description: email that should be sent the information regarding the information type

shipping_location.description: name of the given merchant's 'ship from location'

merchant_order_alert_email.description: Email address or addresses where you want merchant order alert emails sent

merchant_order_alert_text.description: phone number or phone numbers where you want merchant order alert texts sent

merchant_order_cancel_alert_email.description: Email address or addresses where you want merchant order cancel alerts sent

merchant_order_cancel_alert_text.description: phone number or phone numbers where you want merhcant order cancel alert texts sent

return_destination_name.description: name of the given return location

return_alert_email.description: Email address or addresses where you want merchant order alert emails sent

return_alert_text.description: phone number or phone numbers where you want merchant order alert texts sent
